caption.p: Survival curves for Macrosiphum euphorbiae nymphs on well-watered and water-stressed potato plants at current day-night temperatures (25/15 °C) and on well-watered and water-stressed potato plants at high day-night temperatures (30/20 °C). Different letters indicate significant differences between data series (Kaplan–Meier survival regression analysis followed by the log-rank test for pairwise comparisons, P < 0.05; n = 47–71).
